it.azraelsec.Document

Class DocumentsDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.azraelsec.Document.DocumentsDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DocumentsDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The DocumentsDatabase class manages a Documents list which holds references to the existing Documents.

    DocumentsDatabase object is serialized each time Server instance is shutdown and reloaded at runtime.

    Author:
    Federico Gerardi, https://azraelsec.github.io/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentsDatabase()
      Initializes the internal document's ArrayList.

      • createNewDocument

        public void createNewDocument(java.lang.String path,
                              int sectionsNumber,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              User creator)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new Document adding it directly to the DocumentsDatabase.
        Parameters:
        path - new document file path
        sectionsNumber - new document sections number
        name - new document's name
        creator - new document's owner
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getDocumentByName

        public Document getDocumentByName(java.lang.String documentName)
        Looks for the Document based on its name.
        Parameters:
        documentName - document's name
        Returns:
        the document reference or null if it does not exists yet

      • getAllDocumentsNames

        public java.lang.String[] getAllDocumentsNames(User user)
        Collects all the documents a give User can access to.
        Parameters:
        user - user reference
        Returns:
        accessible file names
